item.title: Agile in Data warehousing
item.description: Working in Agile became a hot topic. Big consulting companies (including big 4) realized that implementing agile methodology is a very lucrative business. But have you ever seen a good implementation of Agile methodology in Data Warehousing? Probably not, otherwise you would not bother to read this article. Agile methodology in DWH requires a very special approach. We plan to post a set of articles to describe our experience and practical tips on how to approach Agile in DWH, but letâ€™s start with basic hints.
